mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.project_id as projectId, a.start_date as startDate, a.end_date as endDate, a.is_open as isOpen, a.description, (select count(1) from rdm_issue x where x.iteration = a.id) as issueCount, (select count(1) from rdm_issue x join rdm_app_status y on x.status = y.id and y.is_end = 1 where x.iteration = a.id) as doneIssueCount from rdm_iteration a where a.id = #{value}

select a.id, a.name, a.project_id as projectId, a.start_date as startDate, a.end_date as endDate, a.is_open as isOpen, a.description, (select count(1) from rdm_issue x where x.iteration = a.id) as issueCount, (select count(1) from rdm_issue x join rdm_app_status y on x.status = y.id and y.is_end = 1 where x.iteration = a.id) as doneIssueCount from rdm_iteration a
order by a.id desc limit #{startNum}, #{pageSize}

sql.where:
project_id = #{projectId}
and name like concat('%',#{keyword}, '%')
AND start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDateRange[0]},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND start_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDateRange[1]},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND a.end_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDateRange[0]},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND a.end_date <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDateRange[1]},'%Y-%m-%d')

mapper.insert: insert into rdm_iteration (id, name, project_id, start_date, end_date, is_open, description) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{projectId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 1, #{description})
